readable.title: 2731171552_4a808c7d5a
readable.content: A boy held by a man points his arm towards the sky , as another boy peers through his hands into the air . A boy in a blue and white shirt is pointing up and a second boy in a white shirt shields his eyes . a man holding a young boy on his shoulder . One child is pointing to the sky and another is trying to block the sun to look One man looks into the distance next to another who has his hand in the air .
